mapper.sql: log_id, name, action, detail, ip, create_date
mapper.insert: insert into log (log_id, name, action, ip, create_date, detail) values (#{logId}, #{name}, #{action}, #{ip}, #{createDate}, #{detail})
mapper.update: update log set name = #{name}, action = #{action}, detail = #{detail}, ip = #{ip}, create_date = #{createDate} where log_id = #{logId}
